EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Process Driven Spring Apps Activiti 7AM.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Process Driven Spring Applications with Activiti
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Process Driven Spring Applications with Activiti. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, September 23, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+1) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=660948137> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195292&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 948 137 Thank you,
